title: 820-3115 - no image
message:
Customer punched macbook. The plate was a little crooked.

F9700 was bad, C9782 open.

On the U9000, pin 1- LCD_IG_PWR_EN is 0v. Pin 2 and 3 - 3.3v, pin 4 and 5 is 0v. Tried to change the U9000, nothing changed.

I checked the connector lines from the L9080, L9008 and L9004!
I have 3.3v on L9008, 0v on L9004.

I've already tested it with good display!

title: 820-3115 - no image
message:
Post J9000 voltages; pins 4, 6, 7.
Be sure R9008/9 are good; as traces too.

title: 820-3115 - no image
message:
pins 4, 6, 7 - 3.3v

R9008/9 is 10k without display, with 3k display, lines Ok.

title: 820-3115 - no image
message:
Post now diode mode to ground readings at pins 6 & 7.

You should try changing J9000.

title: 820-3115 - no image
message: Pins 6 e 7 -  without display 0.660,  with display 0.540

title: 820-3115 - no image
message: I checked the lines and reinforced solder on each pin of the J9000. But I will try to change.

title: 820-3115 - no image
message: Also test again with known good LCD assembly.

title: 820-3115 - no image
message: I've already tested it with about 3 displays! The measurements indicate not recognizing the display?

title: 820-3115 - no image
message:
Then must have broken traces, or solders under PCH.
You can check with o-scope if there is communication through LVDS_DDC_CLK/DATA bus.

title: 820-3115 - no image
message:
I changed the J9000 and now I have an image on the display!

Once again, thank you very much for your help!
